name: JSON Archive
description: Record events to a set of newline-delimited JSON streams. The resulting files can be manipulated or imported back into Seq using `clef-tool` or `Serilog.Formatting.Compact.Reader` (C#).

fileSet.helpText: The full path and filename pattern to write, for example `C:\Archive\events-*.json`. The app will replace the wildcard `*` with a timestamp denoting the creation time of each file.

chunkSize.helpText: The maximum size, in bytes, for each file in the set. The default is 104857600 (100 MB).

readableFilenames.helpText: Use a human-readable datetime format (e.g. 2022-05-04T01_13_33Z) for filenames.
